import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Container, Row, Col, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Header from '../Header'; import logo_bootstrap from '../assets/bootstrap-logo.png'; import logo_react from '../assets/react-logo.png'; import github from '../assets/github.png'; import adobe_xd from '../assets/adobe-xd.png'; import whimsical from '../assets/whimsical.png'; import invision from '../assets/invision.png'; import github_grey from '../assets/github-grey.png'; import youtube_grey from '../assets/youtube-grey.png'; import dribble_grey from '../assets/dribble-grey.png'; import instagram_grey from '../assets/instagram-grey.png'; import bali from '../assets/bali-card.jpg'; import undraw_1 from '../assets/undraw_1.png'; import undraw_2 from '../assets/undraw_2.png'; import undraw_3 from '../assets/undraw_3.png'; class Home extends Component { componentDidMount() { $("a[href^='#']").click(function(e) { e.preventDefault(); var position = $($(this).attr("href")).offset().top - 60; $("body, html").animate({ scrollTop: position }, 500); }); } render(){ document.title="Anshor's portfolio" return (
